revised_title: Morphology and Development of Sori in Marattiaceae Ferns
tldr: The author examines the morphology and development of sori in Marattiaceae ferns, focusing on the species Dancea elliptica and D. alata. They describe the structure of the sori, including the sporangia, indusia, and vascular bundles, and discuss variations in their development. The author also compares the findings to those of other fern species, such as Marattia and Kaulfussia.
scientific_discipline: Biology and Life Sciences > Plant Biology
